scripts.debug-tracers: npm run debug -- --tracer java 'cd ./JavaTracer/ && javac -cp src:lib/* --add-exports jdk.jdi/com.sun.tools.jdi=ALL-UNNAMED -d out src/Main.java &> /dev/null && java -cp out:lib/* --add-exports jdk.jdi/com.sun.tools.jdi=ALL-UNNAMED Main {}' --tracer python 'cd ./PythonTracer/ && python -OO ./src/main.py {}'
scripts.start-tracers: npm run start -- --tracer java 'cd ./JavaTracer/ && javac -cp src:lib/* --add-exports jdk.jdi/com.sun.tools.jdi=ALL-UNNAMED -d out src/Main.java &> /dev/null && java -cp out:lib/* --add-exports jdk.jdi/com.sun.tools.jdi=ALL-UNNAMED Main {}' --tracer python 'cd ./PythonTracer/ && python -OO ./src/main.py {}'
scripts.docker-build: npm run docker-tracer-java-build && npm run docker-tracer-python-build && npm run docker-tracer-server-build
scripts.docker-start-tracers: docker container run --rm --interactive --tty --publish 8000:8000 --volume /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -- tracer:server -- --tracer java 'docker run --rm -i tracer:java {}' --tracer python 'docker run --rm -i tracer:python {}'
